person.persName: John Stacker Jr. (Lyon County, Kentucky, clerk and county examiner)

body.p: Eddyville, Lyon County, Kentucky, lawyer and county examiner. Pennsylvania native. Married to Mary E. Gracey Stacker in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 16, 1854. Clerk in Caldwell County in 1850. Household owned eighty-two enslaved persons in 1850. Merchant in Eddyville in 1860. County examiner in Lyon County in 1865.
